thread.title: BRIEF-Syros Pharmaceuticals Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.58

title: BRIEF-Syros Pharmaceuticals Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.58
text: March 12, 2018 / 11:26 AM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Syros Pharmaceuticals Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.58 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 12 (Reuters) - Syros Pharmaceuticals Inc: * SYROS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND HIGHLIGHTS RECENT ACCOMPLISHMENTS AND ANTICIPATED MILESTONES * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.58 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.57 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ANNOUNCED APPOINTMENT OF JOSEPH J. FERRA AS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER * SYROS PHARMA - BELIEVES CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS AS OF DEC 31, 2017 WILL BE SUFFICIENT TO ENABLE CO TO FUND PLANNED OPERATING EXPENSE, CAPEX INTO 2020 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
